channel.title: Merchanting
channel.description:
Just a hint for the people with around 1 mil.(members)
Buy bowstrings 150-160 ea
Then go to forums and sell 180-200 ea
Hope i helped.

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @O_M_F_G O M F G
item.description:
@O_M_F_G wrote:

lol, the best merchanting item are nats
buy 230-250ea at mage guild
sell up to 350ea if ur willing to wasted an hour screaming “glow2:wave2:sellin natures 350ea!!!” or constantly bumping a hopeless thread on the rs forum…other wise sell them 300-310ea…

If u got enough money, whips are the best merchanting thing out there tho
U can make up to 500k per whip…

Read full topic

item.title: Merchanting
item.dc:creator: @not2good not2good
item.description:
@not2good wrote:

Now you see, this topic might of been good, until you added the rep++. You just ruined it, cause now we know you are just out here looking for rep and not trying to be helpful.

And if you need to be refreshed of a rule: 9. We don’t talk about “rep” ever, whether you are asking for it or saying that you have given it. “Quoted from moparisthebest”

Here’s the list of rules if you are too ignorant to believe me.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,3.0.html

Read full topic
